name: Covert a Real‑time transliteration after word termination
Mixed Sinhala + Singlish
expected: Warning Sinhala characters are not allowed in Singlish input.

name: Covert a long paragraph with line breaking
input: Mama adha dina mama thaththa amma la samaga nuwara eliyata train eken gihin. Train journey eka onekama sundara, hills tea estates tunnels waterfalls sabha balala enna rasa wadi. Ella awith api nine arch bridge eka balanna giya, eka loku engineering marvel ekak, photos videos onekama gaththa tourists la samaga. Ehen little adam's peak climb karala top eken view eka breathtaking, clouds walata wada hemin bala inna wage, wind eka strong, cool weather nisa jacket atha, tired una but worth it. Ehen ravum eka hotel ekedi check in karala rest gaththa, night eka dinner eka rice and curry with many side dishes, rasa wadi, kewa atara stories kiyala inna. Next day api kandy yanawa, dalada maligawa balanna, temple eka peaceful, buddha ge datha tiyenne kiyala history ganna interesting, devotees la flowers pahan samaga worship karanawa balala inna. Ehen peradeniya botanical garden giya, flowers orchids spices trees onekama varieties, monkeys innawa careful bags walata, large bat trees amazing. Ehen sigiriya rock fortress climb karanna start karala, steps onekama, halfway eke frescoes beautiful ancient paintings, mirror wall eke old writings, top eken 360 view loku, ancient palace ruins, lion entrance historical. Kashyapa raja ge story kiyala guide kiyana eka listen karala interesting. Ehen dambulla cave temple, caves walata large buddha statues reclining sitting, wall paintings colorful ancient, peaceful atmosphere. Ehen beach side ekata enna unawatuna or mirissa, sea eka blue, waves swim karanna perfect, snorkeling karala fish balala, sunset eka sundara, seafood dinner fresh grilled fish prawns. Holiday eka throughout nature culture history food sabha mix, family la time spend karala onekama memories, sri lanka eka travel karanna best destination ekak, oyatath enna onalu, oyage experience eka unforgettable wenna puluwan.
